price: 49 Quant à ceux qui renient Nos signes, ils subiront les pires tourments pour prix de leur désobéissance.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā yamassuhumu al-ʿadhābu bimā kānū yafsuqūna
